title: Amateur Tournaments
body: I have been looking, but can't find anywhere that sets up joinable online amateur tournaments. Is it just me who thinks this would be really cool?

replies.body: You might be able to find some random tourny's by checking out our [**Community Events page**](https://events.na.leagueoflegends.com/)! That's a site that players can us to come together and host their own player run tournaments.
